Trial_Design.evidence: A single‐blind RCT was performed at a tertiary colorectal unit.

Participants.evidence: Inclusion criteria were patient aged 18 years and over undergoing open elective surgery.

Intervention.evidence: The intervention group received warmed (37°C), humidified (98 per cent relative humidity) carbon dioxide (WHCO 2 group).

Method_Outcome.evidence: Postoperative clinical outcomes were compared between the groups.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Of 40 patients enrolled, 20 in the WHCO 2 group and 19 in the control group were available for analysis.

Number_Analysed.evidence: Of 40 patients enrolled, 20 in the WHCO 2 group and 19 in the control group were available for analysis.

Result_Outcome.evidence: A significant log(T end /T 0 ) difference between control and WHCO 2 groups was documented for interleukin (IL) 2 (5·3 versus 2·8 respectively; P = 0·028) and IL‐4 (3·5 versus 2·0; P = 0·041)
